title: Tomato Water
directions: Line a fine-mesh sieve with cheesecloth; set over a large bowl. Pulse tomatoes, shallots, garlic, basil, cilantro, parsley, vinegar, and salt in a food processor until coarsely chopped.
Transfer mixture to prepared sieve. Cover and chill at least 12 hours. (Do not stir or press on solids, or tomato water will be cloudy). Discard solids; cover tomato water and chill.
Do Ahead: Tomato water can be made 3 days ahead. Keep chilled.
ingredients: 1/4 cup fresh cilantro leaves with tender stems
